TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit SqlDataSourceEnumerator extends System.Data.Common.DbDataSourceEnumerator
Public NotInheritable Class SqlDataSourceEnumerator Inherits DbDataSourceEnumerator

summary.span: 提供了一种枚举本地网络内的所有可用 SQL Server 实例的机制。

span.span: Provides a mechanism for enumerating all available instances of SQL Server within the local network.

remarks.format: ## Remarks SQL Server 2000 和 SQL Server 2005 进行应用程序可以确定在当前网络中的 SQL Server 实例存在。Both SQL Server 2000 and SQL Server 2005 make it possible for applications to determine the existence of SQL Server instances within the current network. 类公开给应用程序开发人员，提供此信息包含所有可用的服务器的信息。The class exposes this information to the application developer, providing a containing information about all the available servers. 返回此表列出了与列表匹配提供当用户尝试创建新的连接的服务器实例以及`Connection Properties`对话框中，展开下拉列表，其中包含所有可用的服务器。This returned table contains a list of server instances that matches the list provided when a user attempts to create a new connection, and on the `Connection Properties` dialog box, expands the drop-down list containing all the available servers.

related.span: 枚举 SQL Server 的实例
